alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Harvey; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 11:13PM CST until January 15 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Central and South Central Kansas. * WHEN...Now through 3 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down small tree branches. Wind chills in the single digits are likely on Saturday. Travel could become hazardous in areas of blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is expected to be a break in the snow or rain snow mix from very late evening until around dawn Saturday morning. Then another band of snow will affect the area from around sunrise until early Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
